about_the_game:
Western Quest is a Western/Steampunk 16-bit JRPG with turn-based combat.

Story

Clyde, a lost wanderer filled with anger, rage and despair is travelling from town to town seeking revenge. How dangerous can a man who has nothing more to lose be?

Dive into a universe mixing Western and Steampunk with a touch of Fantasy and Magic. Meet unique characters, explore this Far-West continent and follow the story of Clyde during his quest for revenge.

Gameplay

Western Quest offers intense and strategic Turn-based combat with its own originality : Elemental ammo system



You can fill your weapon with elemental ammo, that will allow you to perform powerful skills and also deal more damage to the enemies, so be careful to the monsters you are facing to optimize your damage as much as possible!

Main Features

  • SNES-Style JRPG: old-school nostalgia and modern quality of life
  • Innovative battle mechanics
  • Deep story with an anti-hero
  • High Quality Pixel Art
  • Epic 16-bit Soundtrack
